condition_mapping_type.title: Weather Condition
condition_mapping_type.description: Select which mapping you want for the 'Weather Condition' (icon) property.

data_description.mapping_type:
Meteocat: The condition value will be automatically taken from the official Meteocat forecast (fixed mapping, not editable).

Custom: The condition (icon) value will be taken from a local numeric sensor. You will need to define in the next screen the mapping between the local sensor values and the conditions supported by Home Assistant (e.g.: sunny, cloudy, rainy, clear-night, etc.).
